text: At least 24 hours, and not more than 7 days, before the application of pesticides on a multi-unit property, the owner of the property shall provide each resident and tenant of the property that will be treated with the information listed in § 8-403.01 by:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-168, see notes following § 8-403.01.

DC CODE § 8-403.02

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Delivering the information to each resident's door or mailbox, or to each resident through electronic mail or facsimile; and
Posting the information conspicuously in common spaces on the property, in reasonably close proximity to the locations where pesticide will be applied.

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Information to be supplied multi-unit property residents and tenants.
